sentences.en: Britain formed a close alignment with Egypt in the last century.
sentences.cn: 英国在上个世纪与埃及结成了紧密的联盟.

sentences.en: Cairo is the capital of Egypt.
Egypt drew two of their matches in Italy.
sentences.cn: 埃及在意大利收获了两场平局。

sentences.en: Egypt had agreed to a summit subject to certain conditions.
sentences.cn: 埃及有条件地同意了一项峰会主题。

sentences.en: Egypt has lost out on revenues from the Suez Canal.
sentences.cn: 埃及在苏伊士运河上的收益上受了损。

sentences.en: Egypt wants to solve the problem in an atmosphere of cordiality.
sentences.cn: 埃及想要友好地解决该问题。

sentences.en: Glazes had been used from ancient times in Egypt.
sentences.cn: 埃及自古代起就使用釉料.

sentences.en: He is now living in exile in Egypt.
In Egypt, two new camps were readied for the absorption of refugees.
sentences.cn: 在埃及，两个新的营地已经准备好收留难民了。

sentences.en: The Aswan Dam helps to control the River Nile in Egypt.
sentences.cn: 阿斯旺水坝有助于控制埃及的尼罗河.

sentences.en: The cult of Isis was carried from Egypt into Greece and Rome.
sentences.cn: 对伊希斯的膜拜从埃及传到了希腊和罗马。

sentences.en: The established religion of Egypt is Islam.
sentences.cn: 埃及的国教是伊斯兰教。

sentences.en: The new moon was the occasion of festivals of rejoicing in Egypt.
sentences.cn: 在埃及，新月之时是欢庆之日。
他们结队在埃及坐大篷车旅行。

sentences.en: They denied a report that Egypt had agreed to a summit, subject to certain conditions.
sentences.cn: 他们否认了宣称埃及已同意在特定条件下参加峰会的报道。

sentences.en: They struck up a friendship on their tour of Egypt.
sentences.cn: 他们是在埃及游览时成为朋友的.

phrases.tran_cn: 下埃及（指尼罗河三角洲及开罗南郊）
